faqs.question: What is a hackathon?
faqs.answer: Think of hackathons like the 100m sprint of programming and invention. For 24 hours you and a small team will create something new and exciting. With many other teams 'hacking' alongside you.

faqs.question: Can I take part?
faqs.answer: Anyone over 18 who is at any University or has left after the 30th of January 2015 may apply to take part.

faqs.question: Does this cost money?
faqs.answer: No, entry is completely free. In fact, we will even be able reimburse some of your travel costs.

faqs.question: What will I eat?
faqs.answer: Food (and coffee) will be provided at the event.
